summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, forwarding a court scheduling order for a conference related to a detention hearing. It includes dial-in information for accessing the audio feed.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is forwarding a court scheduling order for a conference related to a detention hearing.

events.title: Court Scheduling Order Issued
events.description: A court issued a scheduling order for a conference related to a detention hearing.

keyFacts: A detention hearing-related conference was scheduled in July 2020.
The communication originated from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The court order included dial-in information for public access to the audio feed of the conference.
